original_text:
“Through the window peered Sisera’s mother;
    behind the lattice she cried out,
‘Why is his chariot so long in coming?
    Why is the clatter of his chariots delayed?’
korean_text: 시스라의 어머니가 창문을 통하여 바라보며 창살을 통하여 부르짖기를 그의 병거가 어찌하여 더디 오는가 그의 병거들의 걸음이 어찌하여 늦어지는가 하매

sentences.original_text: Through the window peered Sisera's mother;
behind the lattice she cried out,
'Why is his chariot so long in coming?
sentences.korean_translation: '어째서 그의 전차가 오는 것이 이렇게 늦습니까?

sentences.original_text: Why is the clatter of his chariots delayed?'
